amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce any Veterans Health Administration Directive relating to the prohibition on VA providers from completing forms seeking recommendations on opinions regarding a veteran's participation in a state marijuana program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce any Veterans Health Administration Directive relating to the prohibition on VA providers from completing forms seeking recommendations on opinions regarding a veteran's participation in a state marijuana program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 189 (Roll no. 221).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 233 - 189 (Roll no. 221).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
